ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.p1: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup is reimagining the traditional Taiwanese dining experience through technology and thoughtful design. Founded on a 30-year family recipe, we're bringing the comfort of beef noodle soup to a new generation of diners who value quality, convenience, and unique experiences.
ourStory.p2: Our flagship location in San Francisco features private dining pods inspired by Japanese solo dining concepts, allowing guests to fully immerse themselves in the flavors and aromas of our handcrafted soup without distraction.
ourStory.p3: With a tech-first approach to ordering and service, Oh! offers a seamless dining experience from the moment you place your order through our app to the final spoonful of rich, aromatic broth.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Oh! Beef Noodle Soup ("Oh!", "we", "us", or "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website, mobile application, and physical locations.

infoCollect.title: Information We Collect
infoCollect.intro: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways:

personalData.title: Personal Data
items: Name, email address, and phone number
Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Manage your account and provide customer support
Administer loyalty programs and referral rewards
Improve our products, services, and website

sharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sharing.intro: We may share your information with:
sharing.serviceProviders: Payment processors, delivery partners, and technology providers who help us operate our business
sharing.businessPartners: With your consent, for joint marketing or promotional activities
sharing.legalRequirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
sharing.noSell: We do not sell your personal information to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
items: Access and receive a copy of your personal data
Object to or restrict certain processing

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience, analyze usage, and assist with marketing. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.
